thread.title: Anthony Hyett named HPD Officer of the Year
thread.title_full: Anthony Hyett named HPD Officer of the Year

author: Christina Rodriguez
title: Anthony Hyett named HPD Officer of the Year
text:
Officer Anthony Hyett has been named 2025 Officer of the Year by the Hamilton Police Department.
